titles.title: Independent Contractor Determination Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a safe harbor for determining that certain individuals are not employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/9/2001--Introduced. Independent Contractor Determination Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth criteria for determining whether a service provider and a service recipient are in an employer-employee or an independent contractor relationship.Amends the Revenue Act of 1978, as amended by the Tax Reform Act of 1986, to repeal the prohibition on treating certain technical service providers as independent contractors.
